alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:59AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Norton and northern Graham Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 159 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Logan to near Lenora. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nicodemus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
